body.name: DOVIICO Smart Watch, Upgraded Fitness Full Touch Screen Smart Watch for iOS/Android Phones with Real Time Heart Rate Monitor, Blood Pressure/Oxygen Tracker with Smart Watches for Women Men
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 6 hrs 44 mins
features: 【💕1.69'' Touch Screen & Custom Watch Face】The smartwatch with 1.69'' screen can provide you with high-quality touch and visual experience. After the bracelet is connected with the Mobile app, you can download all kinds of exquisite dials form the Mobile app. You can also turn the scenery and beautiful pictures in the mobile phone into the background of the dial to meet the diversified needs of your.

【💕All-day Activity Tracking】This smart watch has 7 kinds of sports modes(bike riding, Running, Tennis, Strength training, Basketball, Volleyball, Football). Via watch tracker can provide 24hrs Real Time monitoring, calories burned counter, steps counter, allow you to get the real-time stats during your workouts on the watch. Smart watches for men and women are the best choice for sports.

【💕24/7 Heart Rate Monitor & Sleep Tracker】Smartwatch fitness tracker can provide all-around body data tracking, real time monitor your heart rate, blood pressure, blood oxygen (SpO2) and your deep, light sleep state which can help you better understand your health.

【💕Smart Notifications】After the smart watch is connected with Mobile phone app, when there is a message from SMS or social app(WeChat、QQ、Facebook、Twitter、Line、Whatsapp、Instagram), the bracelet will vibrate to remind you. Stay connected with calls, text, other app notifications, and convenient tools like timer, Alarm clock, Stopwatch, Music controller, Weather, Sedentary reminder, Find your phone, etc. to meet your daily use.

【💕Smartwatches For Android IOS Phones】The sports watch is compatible with iOS 9.0 and Android 5.0 and above devices(not for PC or tablet). Download and install the Mobile phone app, bind the smartwatch to your cell phone. You can make and receive calls on the watch or online music, and you can receive alerts of the SMS, incoming calls, and SNS.

【💕Great Battery Life 】When fully charged in 2.5 hours, it lasts for 7 days, with standby time exceeding 30 days. You can relax and enjoy more than a week of travel or work. 👉NOTE:Please read the manual carefully before using these functions to understand how to connect to bluetooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It has like 2 day battery life and is vary easy to use and set-up, and one down side to it the heart rate and any medical things for the watch is a fake, fathermore the phone dose not work on the watch it can tell you who is calling you but you cant answer this is not really worth all the money you got for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dangerously inaccurate heart rate
reviews.reviewText: Obviously very cheap watch but was hoping I could monitor my heart rate until my new watch comes in. I have POTS (postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome) so it's important to keep track of in real time. I almost passed out today and the watch said my HR was 73. I had my husband get the blood pressure cuff and it was actually 143. Has some cool features and would be a great cheap watch if the features actually worked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This watch was a gift for Christmas for my grandsons best friend. He was absolutely thrilled with it and it is very nice and does a lot of things! Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product display is very nice looking. However, when upon using it took me almost a hour to be able to connect It to my phone(iPhone11). The night time setting doesn’t work on it with sending the information from the watch to the app. I had to disconnect the sound from the watch because every sound from my phone went straight to my watch. The battery has a very poor life span. However, I’m no disappointment with the product due to the amount I paid for it. For $20 it’s worth the money and easy to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: got it for an elderly friend and it was easy to set up for her and for her to maintain

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I do not understand anything about this watch !! The instructions are in Chinese or so tiny and do not translate well . I could not use it , it kept reset I g the time so even just as a pocket watch it was useless .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve never owned an Apple Watch but this watch is so good for the price. Wowzers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I always have my AirPods in, and you HAVE to stay connected to it over Bluetooth for it to be able to work. But when you have it connected, it will randomly start playing whatever is supposed to be going through your AirPods, through your watch. So if your in class, someone can randomly connect to your watch and blast music and you have no control over it, or your music will disconnect from your AirPods to your watch and everyone can hear everything. I was also getting it to mimic an Apple Watch since mine broke and didn’t feel like paying a lot of money, and this is HUGE. The square is way too big, you can just tell that it’s off brand and terrible. The time will also keep switching from 11:30 to 16:30. You can also only have army time, not standard which was difficult for me. Overall, not impressed. Will be returning. It did turn on, but worked terrible. Don’t buy.
